stylesheet.name: Basic Performance Counters
stylesheet.description: Will show average values from each task and various Performance Counters.
stylesheet.xsl:
Resource Pool Stats|CPU usage % Buffer Manager|Buffer cache hit ratio Buffer Manager|Free list stalls/sec Buffer Manager|Lazy writes/sec Buffer Manager|Page Life Expectancy Buffer Manager|Page reads/sec Buffer Manager|Page writes/sec Access Methods|Full Scans/sec Access Methods|Index Searches/sec Access Methods|Page Splits/sec Locks|Lock Wait Time (ms) Locks|Lock Waits/sec Locks|Average Wait Time (ms) Locks|Number of Deadlocks/sec SQL Statistics|Batch Requests/sec SQL Statistics|SQL Compilations/sec SQL Statistics|SQL Re-Compilations/sec Setup:
Name Value

Minimum Maximum Average Sum Task Object Name Counter Name Instance Name Minimum Maximum Average Delta

stylesheet.name: Basic Result Xml View
stylesheet.description: Like the Result Xml View, but with "connectionValues" and "performanceCounters" nodes excluded. Also "Description" on "Task" and "Tasks" nodes are excluded.
stylesheet.xsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!-- Made with Xml Visualizer v.2 http://xmlvisualizer.codeplex.com/ -->
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="node()|@*"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="node()|@*" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="/result/tasks/@description" /> <xsl:template match="/result/tasks/task/@description" /> <xsl:template match="/result/tasks/task/data/connectionValues" /> <xsl:template match="/result/performanceCounters" />
</xsl:stylesheet>
